title: 66: Know The Signs
description:
Runaway fast as youuuu can…seriously
Welcome back Slooties! Not to be a hater of love and all things happy, but this week we focus on some of the perks of Valentine's Day ENDING. Don’t lie, you know you’re happy that shit is over too. Next, Sofia unpacks the wild world that is Keeping up with the Kardashians…and Kanye West. We unpack it from a micro level and discuss how dangerous the behavior we’re seeing truly is. Which leads us gracefully into this week's Sloot University which hones in on the MANY various types of abuse, and how it’s not always what you see in the movies. Roses are red, Violets are blue, Sloots - just because he says it, it doesn’t mean he really loves you. We learn behaviors to watch out for and how to really look certain things in the eye, no matter how much it hurts. 
TW: Domestic violence and abusive behavior
National Domestic Violence Hotline: 1-800-799-7233
Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 
OK Cupid: Download OK Cupid from the App Store or Google Play today!
Native Deodorant: http://www.nativedeo.com/SOFIA or use promo code SOFIA at checkout and get 20% off your first order
Bloom Nu: http://www.bloomnu.com/SOFIA for 15% off your purchase today!
Download Switchcraft for free and unlock the magical mystery!
